project.component: { "keyToString": { ".NET Launch Settings Profile.SpectrailTestDataProvider.API: SeectrailTestSever.API.executor": "Debug", ".NET Launch Settings Profile.SpectrailTestDataProvider.API: http (1).executor": "Debug", ".NET Launch Settings Profile.SpectrailTestDataProvider.API: http.executor": "Debug", "ASKED_SHARE_PROJECT_CONFIGURATION_FILES": "true", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.git.unshallow": "true", "SHARE_PROJECT_CONFIGURATION_FILES": "true", "XThreadsFramesViewSplitterKey": "0.4540311", "fe69751c-ae6e-4f11-a5b0-f84c479e81b4.executor": "Debug", "git-widget-placeholder": "main", "node.js.detected.package.eslint": "true", "node.js.detected.package.tslint": "true", "node.js.selected.package.eslint": "(autodetect)", "node.js.selected.package.tslint": "(autodetect)", "nodejs_package_manager_path": "npm", "rider.code.cleanup.on.save": "true", "rider.code.cleanup.on.save.profile": "SB-C#: Full Cleanup", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "AtomSelectConfig", "vue.rearranger.settings.migration": "true" }, "keyToStringList": { "com.intellij.ide.scratch.ScratchImplUtil$2/New Scratch File": [ "C#" ] } }

task.summary: Default task

Add ICD-related MongoDB support and update data models
Introduced `ICDName` and `ICDDescription` properties in `ICDEntity` and configured MongoDB integration with `ICDMongoDataContext`. Updated `EntityBase` to use MongoDB-specific attributes and default values. Adjusted app settings and added MongoDB.Bson package to support the changes.

Refactor ICDEntity and enhance MongoDB context seeding.
Updated `ICDEntity` to include default values for metadata fields and adjusted its initialization logic. Modified MongoDB data context to utilize `ICDEntity` explicitly and added preconfigured data for seeding. Updated `ICDEntityVm` to align with the entity's fields.

Remove unused userName parameter from GetICDData endpoint.
The userName parameter in the GetICDData endpoint was unnecessary and has been removed to simplify the method signature. This change helps reduce potential confusion and aligns the API with its intended functionality.

Remove `userName` parameter from `GetICDData` API endpoint.
The `userName` parameter was unused and has been replaced with an empty string in the query construction. This change simplifies the method signature and eliminates redundant input. No functional impact is expected from this update.

Refactor API integrations and implement new feature handler
Removed `DuplicateVariableHandler` and replaced it with `SpectrailNewFeatureHandler`, introducing dynamic API service registration via `ApiServiceFactory`. Added `ICDDataService` for fetching data and updated dependency injection in `PlaywrightFactory`. Enhanced handlers and test structure for better scalability.

Refactor configuration handling and register new services
Updated `ConfigHelper` to improve setting retrieval logic, adding support for multiple configuration sections and validating input keys. Registered `ApiServiceFactory` and improved exception handling for `RestClient` initialization in `PlaywrightFactory`.

Refactor API client management and service registration.
Replaced RestSharp-based direct service registration with a dynamic `ApiClient` implementation, reading API base URLs from a new `ApiClients` configuration section. Updated `ApiServiceFactory` to dynamically inject corresponding `ApiClient` instances into services. Reorganized API-related classes to a new `API` namespace for better modularity.

Refactor ICD data handling and add base entity models.
Replaced `GetDataAsync` with `GetICDDataAsync` for clearer intent and proper deserialization of API responses into `ICDRecord` objects. Introduced `BaseEntity` and `ICDRecord` classes to standardize and extend model structure across the framework. Enhanced error handling for unsuccessful API responses.

Refactor handler initialization in test setup.
Reorganized and renamed variables for clarity and consistency. Ensured proper usage of `IHandlerFactory` and updated relevant assignments to improve code readability and maintainability.

Update ICDDataService endpoint and improve naming consistency
The ICDDataService endpoint was updated to "/GetICDData" for clarity. Adjustments were made across the codebase to align namespaces and Swagger configurations for improved readability and consistency. These changes enhance maintainability and better reflect the API's purpose.

Rename service registration methods and update references.
Renamed `AddApplicationServices` and `AddInfrastructureServices` methods to `RegisterApplicationServices` and `RegisterInfrastructureServices` for better clarity and consistency. Updated all references in relevant files to reflect these changes.
Excel support is added

Add MediatR DI package and refactor ExcelService logic
Added the MediatR.Extensions.Microsoft.DependencyInjection package to the project for service registration. Refactored ExcelService to improve readability and maintainability by restructuring checksum handling and introducing a method for extracting cell values. Commented out MongoDB operations to disable storage features for now.

Remove unused folder reference from project file.
The `Features\OutputDataProvider` folder reference was removed from the `.csproj` file as it is no longer used. This change helps clean up the project structure and avoid unnecessary build dependencies.

Refactor ServerConfigHelper for cross-platform path handling
Updated ServerConfigHelper to dynamically resolve paths and ensure compatibility across operating systems. Modified appsettings.json to use relative paths, improving portability. Enhanced key retrieval logic to handle multiple configuration sources and added robust path resolution for OS-specific scenarios.

Refactor service registration and improve readability.
Replaced `Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly()` with `GetExecutingAssembly()` for clarity and inline static usage. Adjusted line formatting for better code readability and consistency, particularly in scoped service registrations. Removed unused `System.Reflection` import to clean up dependencies.

Refactor ExcelService to fix async issues and streamline logic
Changed the method to use `async` for proper asynchronous handling. Fixed misplaced checksum comparison logic and removed commented-out code for clarity. Adjusted repository operations to ensure data consistency during updates.

Refactor checksum handling and optimize database updates.
Introduced improved checksum calculation, storage, and usage for more efficient change detection and data updates. Replaced individual delete/insert operations with batched async operations for better performance. Updated checksum property in `EntityBase` to be stored in MongoDB.

Remove unused MediatR references and registration code
Eliminated references and registration for MediatR as they were no longer used in the codebase. This cleanup improves maintainability and reduces unnecessary dependencies in the application.

Refactor config handling for improved flexibility and clarity.
Updated the configuration base path to support cross-platform environments (Docker, macOS, Windows, Linux). Simplified key retrieval logic with null-coalescing operators, reducing redundancy. Added comments for clarity and ensured exception messages remain consistent.

Add ICDExcelService, ApplicationConfigHelper, and feature flags
Introduced `ICDExcelService` to facilitate Excel data processing and handling, including checksum validation and data storage. Added `ApplicationConfigHelper` for enhanced configuration management, supporting dynamic path resolution and feature toggling. Updated `appsettings.json` to include feature flags and ICD file settings for improved configurability.

#Major Change
Refactor configuration helper and enhance ICD service.
Replaced `ApplicationConfigHelper` with `ServerConfigHelper` for better DI support and modularity. Refactored ICD service to streamline database operations, enable dynamic method invocation, enhance checksum validation, and improve logging. Added missing repository methods for batch operations and improved API controller endpoints.

Add error handling in MongoDataProvider and comment EntityBase ID
Wrapped `AddAsync` in a try-catch block to improve error traceability and prevent silent failures. Commented out `EntityBase` ID properties, marking them with explanatory notes, possibly for future adjustments or testing purposes.

Add exception handling and ObjectId support in Mongo methods
Introduced exception handling in MongoDB data operations for better error diagnostics and resilience. Updated `EntityBase` to use `ObjectId` for proper MongoDB compatibility. These changes improve robustness and align with MongoDB's best practices.

Refactor repository operations to use enum and attributes
Introduced `RepositoryOperation` enum and `RepositoryOperationAttribute` to enhance type safety and readability of repository commands. Updated related code to leverage these changes, improving maintainability and reducing reliance on string-based operations.

Refactor ICD data seeding logic and middleware integration
Renamed methods and enums for better clarity, including replacing `Initialize` with `SeedData`. Introduced middleware to support ICD data seeding on startup driven by feature flags. Simplified and modularized configuration management and repository operations.

Refactor ICDExcelService to remove redundant fields.
Removed private fields `_mediator` and `_configHelper` in favor of directly using constructor parameters `mediator` and `configHelper` throughout the class. This simplifies the code by reducing redundancy and improves maintainability.

Update default audit fields to use environment variables
Replaced static "System" value with dynamic values from `Environment.UserName` or `Environment.MachineName`, falling back to "Unknown" if unavailable. This ensures better traceability by capturing the actual user or machine making changes.

Improve error handling and data validation in ICDExcelService
Added validations to ensure entity types are assignable from EntityBase. Enhanced error handling for method invocation and property value conversions, including support for enums and sanitized cell values. Improved logging for better debugging and issue tracking.

Enable ICD database seeding with eager loading condition
Removed commented-out code to activate ICD database seeding when the "EnableEagerLoading" feature is enabled. This ensures that the seeding logic runs as intended based on the configuration.

Update solution structure with new projects and renaming
Renamed "SpectrailTestServer" to "TestServer" for consistency. Added new solution folders "Framework" and "Tests" with associated projects. These changes enhance organization and clarity of the project structure.

Remove deprecated code and unused components.
This commit removes several unused classes, interfaces, and configuration files, such as `ActionFactory`, `ApiClient`, `BaseEntity`, and related services and handlers. This cleanup improves maintainability and eliminates redundancy from the codebase.

Remove legacy ICD-related code and redundant configurations
Deleted unused domain entities, services, queries, and controllers linked to ICD. Also removed obsolete appsettings, Dockerfile, and IDE-specific files. This simplifies the codebase, eliminating outdated functionality and unnecessary dependencies.

Relocate Shared project to TestServer directory.
Moved the `SpectrailTestDataProvider.Shared` project and its associated configuration files to the `TestServer` directory. This change improves project structure and aligns with organizational standards for file placement. All functionality remains unchanged.

Update project paths in SpectrailTest solution file.
Reorganized the paths for 'SpectrailTestFramework' and 'SpectrailTests' projects in the solution. Updated project configuration mappings to reflect the new structure. This change improves project organization and ensures compatibility with the updated directory structure.

Add missing project reference to SpectrailTestFramework
This change adds a previously missing reference to the SpectrailTestFramework project. It ensures the correct dependencies are included for the test project to build and function properly.

Fix project and solution structure for proper references
Duplicate project references were added and corrected, ensuring all necessary references are included in the solution file and project files. This update resolves inconsistencies in project dependencies and improves overall build correctness.

Remove duplicate project reference in test project file
The SpectrailTests.csproj file contained a redundant reference to the SpectrailTestFramework project. This change cleans up the ItemGroup by removing the duplicate entry, ensuring clarity and avoiding potential build issues.

Refactor code formatting and improve readability.
Adjusted inconsistent code formatting across multiple files for better readability and maintainability. Removed unnecessary blocks, streamlined conditions, and improved exception handling alignment. No functional changes introduced.

Remove unnecessary whitespace in IEntityBase interface
The IEntityBase interface contained extraneous whitespace, which has been removed to improve code cleanliness and maintain consistent formatting. No functional changes were made.

Remove unused service reference from infrastructure
Eliminated the unnecessary `SpectrailTestDataProvider.Application.Services` import to clean up the codebase. This reduces clutter and improves maintainability without affecting functionality. No changes were made to the service registration logic.

Refactor variable declarations and simplify code structure
Replaced explicit types with 'var' for cleaner and more consistent variable declarations across test files. Introduced #region directives for better code organization and merged conditional statement blocks to remove unnecessary brackets. Updated method parameter usage for Playwright API calls to improve readability and maintainability.

Standardize variable declarations and add region directives.
Replaced explicit type declarations with 'var' across multiple files for consistency and readability. Added '#region' and '#endregion' directives to organize using statements uniformly across the codebase.

Add new project folders to solution structure
Added "Services," "BuildingBlocks," and "ApiGateways" folders to the solution file. These changes organize related projects under designated sections, improving solution modularity and clarity.

Remove unused ICD-related implementations and configurations.
Deleted ICD-specific models, services, controllers, configurations, and associated files, simplifying the codebase. These components were deemed unnecessary for the project's current requirements.

Refactor and relocate Shared project structure.
Moved `SpectrailTestDataProvider.Shared` to the BuildingBlocks directory for better project modularity. Updated references in solution files and related projects to reflect the new structure.

Remove unused classes and configurations.
This commit deletes multiple files and classes, including factories, action handlers, utilities, and API-related components, as well as configuration files. The removal likely aims to clean up unused or redundant code, potentially simplifying the framework and reducing maintenance overhead.

Remove duplicate project references from csproj files
Duplicate project references in the csproj files have been cleaned up to improve maintainability and reduce redundancy. This change ensures a more streamlined and accurate dependency list for the affected projects.

Remove unused files and refactor SpectrailTestFramework
Deleted obsolete files across various SpectrailTest modules, including domain entities, configurations, and Docker-related files. Simplified overall structure by eliminating unnecessary classes, services, and helper utilities in favor of a cleaner codebase.

MESSAGE.value:
Refactor repository operations to use enum and attributes
Introduced `RepositoryOperation` enum and `RepositoryOperationAttribute` to enhance type safety and readability of repository commands. Updated related code to leverage these changes, improving maintainability and reducing reliance on string-based operations.

Refactor ICD data seeding logic and middleware integration
Renamed methods and enums for better clarity, including replacing `Initialize` with `SeedData`. Introduced middleware to support ICD data seeding on startup driven by feature flags. Simplified and modularized configuration management and repository operations.

Refactor ICDExcelService to remove redundant fields.
Removed private fields `_mediator` and `_configHelper` in favor of directly using constructor parameters `mediator` and `configHelper` throughout the class. This simplifies the code by reducing redundancy and improves maintainability.

Update default audit fields to use environment variables
Replaced static "System" value with dynamic values from `Environment.UserName` or `Environment.MachineName`, falling back to "Unknown" if unavailable. This ensures better traceability by capturing the actual user or machine making changes.

Improve error handling and data validation in ICDExcelService
Added validations to ensure entity types are assignable from EntityBase. Enhanced error handling for method invocation and property value conversions, including support for enums and sanitized cell values. Improved logging for better debugging and issue tracking.

Removed commented-out code to activate ICD database seeding when the "EnableEagerLoading" feature is enabled. This ensures that the seeding logic runs as intended based on the configuration.

Deleted obsolete files across various SpectrailTest modules, including domain entities, configurations, and Docker-related files. Simplified overall structure by eliminating unnecessary classes, services, and helper utilities in favor of a cleaner codebase.
